name: bionode-bwa
description: A Node.js wrapper for the Burrow-Wheeler Aligner (BWA).

scripts.preinstall: git clone https://github.com/lh3/bwa.git; cd bwa; git checkout 0.7.12; make
scripts.test: standard && dependency-check . && node test/bionode-bwa.js | tap-spec && rm test/reference.* && rm test/reads.* && rm test/alignment.sam
scripts.coverage: standard && dependency-check . && istanbul cover test/bionode-bwa.js --report lcovonly -- | tap-spec && rm -rf ./coverage; rm test/reference.*; rm test/reads.*; rm test/alignment.sam
scripts.coveralls: istanbul cover test/bionode-bwa.js --report lcovonly -- | tap-spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/.bin/coveralls && rm -rf ./coverage; rm test/reference.*; rm test/reads.*; rm test/alignment.sam
